description:
With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters on the field at once, but each creature receives a power boost from Orichalcos’s malevolent energies!  Yugi better find a way to protect himself against Gurimo’s super horde, for the loser of the duel will have his soul sealed away forever!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: オレイカルコスの結界
